name: .HWT
summary: Learn about .HWT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an HWT file in Huawei Themes (Android). To do so:
Use a file manager to place the file in your Huawei EMUI smartphone's ~/​Internal storage/​Huawei/​Themes directory. (On Magic UI phones, place the file in the ~/​Internal storage/​Theme directory.)
Open Huawei Themes and select Me → My themes.
The theme your HWT file contains should appear. Select the theme and then Apply.
If you want to view the assets an HWT file contains, rename the file to use the .zip extension and open it as you would any ZIP file.
